metadata.title: Pulsar - Create pages to document your project
metadata.description: Create modern documentation for your application using Pulsar. You will generate custom static documentation pages with Pulsar and can use them wherever you want.

documentations.title: Pulsar - Your documentations
documentations.delete-doc-dialog-title: Do you want to delete the documentation?
documentations.delete-doc-dialog-message: After deleting this documentation, you won't be able to recover your data. Think better before taking this action.
